price: 7. Quand ils y seront précipités, ils en percevront un râle et un bouillonnement.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
